title: Understanding Table Naming
text: To name a table in a document, you need to access the table properties. This is usually done through the table tools menu.

title: Locating the Table Tools
text: The table tools can typically be found in the toolbar when you click on the table. Look for options like 'Table Design' or 'Layout'.

hintAnswer: use the table name text box (table tools|properties)
title: Using the Table Name Text Box
text: Once you have accessed the table tools, find the 'Properties' option. There should be a text box where you can enter the table name.
choices: use the table name text box (table tools
click on the table and enter in your desired name
